name: MCSEU v3 Flat Chat
description:
A flat theme for the chat from the German website minecraft-server.eu. The theme includes:
  • A new visual style for the chat
  • Usability with smaller screens (it won't hide anymore like it used to do)
  • A brand new mobile view that expands over the whole screen
Note to mobile view: I can't control the functionality of the chat! When visiting the site in a new browsing session, the chat could be opened up expanded and most of the time this is the case. Please keep that in mind.
